title: Off Script... Coronation Street & Emmerdale
overview: Off Script celebrates Britain's longest running and best loved soap operas, Coronation Street and Emmerdale, offering the ultimate download on life behind the scenes on the cobbles and in the dales, from the legends who have played some of Britain's best loved characters. Each episode will see interviews with the nation's favourite soap stars and give exclusive access to both soaps by previewing upcoming scenes from the week ahead.
